name: Virus Attack!
description: YOU ARE THE ANTIVIRUS THAT PROTECTS THE PC OF THE PROTAGONIST, WHICH, LIKES TO PIRATE A LOT, BUT VERY MUCH, AND THEREFORE, THE COMPUTER IS VERY FAST FULLED OF VIRUSES. YOU ARE THE PERSON WHO WILL THE COMPUTER OF THE PROTAGONIST BE FREE OF VIRUSES, FOR THAT YOU WILL USE TURRETS THAT WILL HELP YOU IN YOUR WORK TO DESTROY THE VARIOUS VIRUSES, WHICH YOU WILL BE ABLE TO POSITION AROUND A DEFINED MAP. TRY THAT THE ENEMIES DO NOT CROSS THE MAP AND ARRIVE AT THE END.
